question:
The following text is for questions number 26 - 30.    Baturaden is a tourist destination in Banyumas regency, Central Java, Indonesia. It is located in the northern
town of Purwokerto just on the south slope of Mount Slamet with height 640 m above sea level. The air temper
ture ranges between 180-25° Celsius with humidity from 70 to 80 mm Hg.
The air in Baturaden is very cool but the scenery is very beautiful and natural. From the town of Purwokerto, the
road to this Baturraden is only about 14 km to the north, and can be reached by public transportation.
Baturaden also a tourist area visited by many local tourists, as well as foreign tourists, especially on Sundays
and national holidays. To accommodate them, there are some hotels and inn available there. ​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

terjemahan

Baturaden adalah tujuan wisata di Kabupaten Banyumas, Jawa Tengah, Indonesia. Itu terletak di utara

kota Purwokerto tepat di lereng selatan Gunung Slamet dengan ketinggian 640 m di atas permukaan laut. Temperatur udara

suhu berkisar antara 180-25° Celcius dengan kelembaban 70 hingga 80 mm Hg.

Udara di Baturaden sangat sejuk namun pemandangannya sangat indah dan alami. Dari kota Purwokerto,

jalan menuju Baturraden ini hanya berjarak sekitar 14 km ke arah utara, dan dapat ditempuh dengan kendaraan umum.

Baturaden juga merupakan kawasan wisata yang banyak dikunjungi wisatawan lokal, maupun wisatawan mancanegara, terutama pada hari Minggu

dan hari libur nasional. Untuk menampung mereka, ada beberapa hotel dan penginapan yang tersedia di sana.

related_questions.question:
(A) For each of the following, choose the most suitable answer and write its number    in the brackets provided.
1. The ivory statue on the table
(1) were bought
(2) will be bought
in India
(3) was bought
(4) is being bought​

6.) ....... Mary reading a book in her classroom at this moment?    a. Is
b. am
c. was
d. Were

7 Susan and Susanna ......... writing poems for an English cubiect now
a. is 
b. Are 
c. Am
d. Be

Pliss bantu Lagi Kakak Besok ujian saya harus di kumpul​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

6.) ....... Mary reading a book in her classroom at this moment?

a. Is

b. am

c. was

d. Were

7 Susan and Susanna ......... writing poems for an English cubiect now

a. is

b. Are

c. Am

d. Be

Penjelasan:

Jawaban dicetak tebal dan menggunakan bentuk Present Continuous Tense. Nomor 6. karena subjeknya Mary, maka Tobe nya adalah a. is.

Nomor 7. karena subjeknya Susan dan Susanna, maka Tobe nya adalah b. are.

Semoga membantu ya.

Jawaban:

16. b. regularly

17. d. every week

18. semua bener

19. b. breakfast

20. c. the dish

Jawaban:

16. B. regularly

17. D. Every week

18. C. Every morning

19. B. breakfast

related_questions.question:
19. Indri    Sinta : Today is September 9.
Indri : I see, thanks
a. What day is it today? c. Is today the September 9?
b. What date is it today? d. When will we leave?​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

B. What date is it today?

Penjelasan: Date biasa digunakan jika jawaban memiliki angka seperti: Desember 4

Day biasa digunakan jika jawaban hanya memiliki hari tidak ada angka seperti: Friday

Jawaban:

a. What day is it today?

maaf kalo salah

related_questions.question: When was he chosen as minister of education? *

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

When was he chosen as minister of education?

He was chosen as the minister of education in 2019.

Penjelasan:

Kalimat menggunakan bentuk Passive dari Simple Past Tense:

(+) Subject + Tobe (was/were) + Verb-3

Semoga membantu ya.

I am the second daughter of three children. My father
has two daughters (putri) and one son (putra). I love

sometime? I live at joyoboyo street number 13. I love
studying here very much, thank you.
